title: Please unban my account.
body:
please i dont want my account to be banned. ive played on it for 4 years. PLEASE IVE SPENT $2.6k on the game please. PLEASE I WOULD LIIKE TO BE UNBANNED perm. I wouldnt mind if it was for only for 14 days if you could please unban this account from perm! please i would like that a lot ive spent so much time of my life in this game. Please could please over look this. Please, im begging you! :C i would do anything
Give me a 14 day ban.  I dont want to be perm banned especially if i spent 2.5k on the game please.! Riot.
I WILL NEVER TALK IN CHAT EVER AGAIN. just give a perm ban on chat. please im begging anything. i would like this account to be unbanned.
Please ive spent so much money. on this account and would love to play on it and i will never be toxic again. please. I got tilted that one game because my champ got banned in select andt their kayn had gotten really and aimed me all game. bullying but i dont care. I would just like to play on this account again even if it means. i will never talk in chat again. PLEASE OVERLOOK THIS IM BEGGING YOU!!!!!!!!! :C
 edit : I know my account probably isnt going to get unbanned. but if possible and it does get unbanned, i will not talk in chat unless it is necesarilly something nice or compliment on teamwork. I would like to know what would happen to my account as i used a lot of money and i mean a lot 2.5k to be exact. If possible please can i get the account lowered to a 14 day ban or a 100 day chat restriction.

replies.body: the hardest part is to accept that it is gone.
Your grammar is horrible and you keep repeating the same things over and over like it's going to make a difference, once your account is banned, ITS NOT COMING BACK.

Wrong mindset. After losing a game with my mains getting banned and having a really fed Kayn on the other team and finding out your account got perm banned after a game, does things to you.. But yea thanks.

Wrong mindset? Doesn't matter what happened in that game mate, once your account is perma banned THATS IT. There is no chance, no matter how hard you appeal for it, that it's EVER coming back. No perma banned account HAS EVER been unbanned with the exception of a few people who have been incorrectly banned because of script accusations.

Hey there! I responded to your other thread here:

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/15rrWP5x-help?comment=0000

I will note, however, that spending money on the game doesn't excuse toxicity. Players who have received a punishment are expected to adjust their behaviour to more closely align with community-acceptable behaviour. Let me know if you have any questions.
